RNN and RNN - context.from sentence:
Baselines for LCSTS are introduced in the following .
RNN and RNN - context are the RNNbased seq2seq models , without and with attention mechanism respectively .

Copy - Net.from sentence: Copy - Net is the attention - based seq2seq model with the copy mechanism .

SRB.from sentence: SRB is a model that improves semantic relevance between source text and summary .

DRGD.from sentence: DRGD is the conventional seq2seq with a deep recurrent generative decoder .

ABS and ABS +.from sentence: As to the baselines for Gigaword , ABS and ABS + are the models with local attention and handcrafted features .

Feats.from sentence: Feats is a fully RNN seq2seq model with some specific methods to control the vocabulary size .

RAS - LSTM and RAS - Elman.from sentence: RAS - LSTM and RAS - Elman are seq2seq models with a convolutional encoder and an LSTM decoder and an Elman RNN decoder respectively .

SEASS.from sentence: SEASS is a seq2seq model with a selective gate mechanism .

DRGD.from sentence: DRGD is also a baseline for Gigaword .
